teaser: The Justice Department charges FIFA soccer officials with corruption. More contenders enter the already-crowded 2016 presidential race. And former House Speaker Dennis Hastert is indicted for violating banking laws and lying to the FBI. A panel of journalists joins Diane for analysis of the week's top national news stories.
